name: Fighting Illusion: K-1 GP 2000
overview: The K1 is a multi-discipline martial arts fest really popular in Japan. Fighting Illusion K1 Grand Prix 2000 features these games modes: K1 Grand Prix, K1 Challenge, Training, K1 Dream, K1 Kings, Ringside, Monster Factory & K1 Hercules, K1 Bible & Andy's Memorial. The release of 2000 of the Fighting Illusion K1 series for Playstation features a training mode in which the player can select between different kind of trainings to improve the stats of his fighter & new fighters not presented in previous versions of the series.
